妑字的基本解释

妑
pā
古女子人名用字。
少女发式，梳成双髻：“初扎妑角末上头。”

妑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pā］
［《廣韻》普巴切，平麻，滂。］
(1)女子名用字。
(2)少女发式，扎成双髻。

妑字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妑； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页256第15
【集韻】邦家切，音巴。女名。一曰妑頭，女兒雙髻也。　又【廣韻】普巴切【類編】披巴切，?音葩。女字。

妑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
妑字的起名意思

古女子人名用字。少女发式，梳成双髻。

Yo
Basic explanation of words
Yo
pā
Ancient women's names used characters.
The girl's hair style, combed into a double bun: "At the beginning, you pierced your head at the end of the horns."
Yo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pā］
["Guangyun" Pubache, Pingma, Pang. ]
(1) Words used in women's names.
(2) The girl's hair style, tied into a double bun.
Yo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妑; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 256 to 15
[Jiyun] Bangjiaqie, Yinba. Female name. One said, your daughter, and her daughter's double-up bun.　[Guangyun] Pubache [Classification] Pipache,? Yinpa. Female characters.
